alert.note: Alert for Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 3:58PM EDT until May 21 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Johnson County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Washington County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 358 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mount Rogers Summit, or near Whitetop, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mountain City, Damascus, Laurel Bloomery and Konnarock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
